tool_description: Find nonprofits using variable search criteria and explore essential information.
name: Essentials
title: Essentials

api_list.name: essentials_lookup
api_list.description: Provides a list of all the tables used as a filter_name with the Essentials Lookup endpoints. The tables and their contents can be used to generate dropdowns and filters in your system when using the Essentials API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://essentials.p.rapidapi.com/lookup"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "essentials.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://essentials.p.rapidapi.com/lookup"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

api_list.name: essentials_lookup_{filter_name}
api_list.description: Provides a list of all the human-readable search values within a specific filter_name table that can be used in search queries with the Essentials endpoints. Each array contains a table key, name value, and search value. The resulting search_value (s) can be passed as search values in the Essentials API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://essentials.p.rapidapi.com/lookup/ntee_major"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "essentials.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://essentials.p.rapidapi.com/lookup/{filter_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "essentials.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

data.description: A list of all the tables used as a filter_name with the Essentials Lookup endpoints

items.description: Key value pair for filter name and value
